name: Geomorphic Gauntlet
description:
In Geomorphic Gauntlet, you must guide your character and destroy the monster generators before you get overwhelmed by the relentless swarm of virus-like monsters.

With original music and graphics, as well as character vector graphics created by brgfx taken from www.freepik.com, we hope you enjoy this romp through a geomorphic maze!

The original music can be heard here: https://soundcloud.com/gavinkoh/sanctity-of-the-sepulchre

Gameplay Instructions:

Use arrow keys and walk over the white disc-shaped generators to destroy them. These generators will warp in virus-like monsters that will chase you relentlessly. Every collision with a monster will deduct 5 hit points from your health.

Complete level 4 to see your final score!
